sources.title: Spider baby [videorecording]
description: A caretaker devotes himself to three children after the death of their father. Relatives arrive to lay claim to the estate but the caretaker suspects that they will put the children in an asylum. To prevent this, he destroys the estate, himself, and the children.
Lon Chaney, Carol Ohmart, Quinn Redeker, Beverly Washburn, Jill Banner
Written and directed by Jack Hill ; co-director, Bart Patton ; producers, Paul Monka and Gil Lasky ; co-producers, Alan Riseman and Marvin Levine ; music by Ronald Stein
Videocassette release of the 1964 motion picture
A little chiller about the anitcs of a very unusual-- and very sick-- family
